mapper.select: SELECT A.ibuy, A.iproduct, A.icustomer , A.quantity, A.buy_at buyAt , B.nm productNm, B.price productPrice , B.main_pic productMainPic , C.nm customerNm FROM t_buy A INNER JOIN t_product B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN t_customer C ON A.icustomer = C.icustomer WHERE A.icustomer = #{icustomer} ORDER BY ibuy DESC
